EmailTemplate.subject: Can’t wait to see you at Strata + Hadoop World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Pivotal has a lot going on this year as a sponsor, presenter and exhibitor at Strata + Hadoop World – September 29th - October 1st in New York. If you haven’t registered yet, use Pivotal 20 <https://en.oreilly.com/big-data-conference-ny-2015/public/register> to get a 20% discount on the current published price.
Pivotal is transforming how the world builds software. To learn more about our combination of leading agile development services, open cloud platform and open suite of big data products, be sure to visit us at booth #531!
At the booth, you can see the latest Pivotal Big Data Suite <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> demos, learn more about the Federation Business Data Lake <http://www.emcfederation.com/solutions/business-data-lakes.htm> and the Open Data Platform <http://opendataplatform.org/> Initiative, or just speak with our industry experts.
Pivotal will also be hosting a session, entitled Business impact from IoT? Just add data science <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ny-2015/public/schedule/detail/45881> and co-sponsoring the Data After Dark: High Line Hop <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ny-2015/public/schedule/detail/44510> with our partner, EMC.
We look forward to seeing you in New York!
The Pivotal Team
